meanings.definition: Causing feelings of anger and annoyance due to being unable to achieve something.
meanings.sent1: It is frustrating when I can't solve a simple puzzle.
meanings.sent2: The long line at the store was frustrating for everyone.
meanings.sent3: Trying to untangle my headphones was frustrating, but I finally did it!
meanings.sent4: The maze of rules and regulations was a frustrating obstacle to overcome.
meanings.sent5: The constant traffic jam was frustrating beyond belief.

meanings.definition: Preventing someone from achieving a goal or fulfilling a desire.
meanings.sent1: The broken elevator was frustrating for the people on the top floor.
meanings.sent2: The lack of resources was frustrating for the team trying to finish the project.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's antics were frustrating for the bird trying to build its nest.
meanings.sent4: The stormy weather was a frustrating barrier to our outdoor plans.
meanings.sent5: The locked door was frustratingly impossible to open.
